insert into five_oa_inland_project_review (business_key, project_name, project_content, project_type, achievement, dept_id, dept_name, start_time, end_time, charge_men, charge_men_name, attender, attender_name, total_price, materials_cost, appropriative_cost, outsource_cost, meeting_cost, travel_cost, specialist_cost, fixe_asset_depreciation_cost, fuel_power_cost, salary_service_cost, scientific_first_trial, scientific_first_trial_name, remark, creator, creator_name, gmt_create, gmt_modified, is_deleted, is_process_end, process_instance_id, is_secret, review_type) values (#{businessKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{projectName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{projectContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{projectType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{achievement,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deptId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{deptName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{startTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{endTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{chargeMen,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{chargeMenName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attender,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attenderName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{totalPrice,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{materialsCost,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{appropriativeCost,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{outsourceCost,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{meetingCost,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{travelCost,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{specialistCost,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fixeAssetDepreciationCost,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fuelPowerCost,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{salaryServiceCost,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{scientificFirstTrial,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{scientificFirstTrialName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{creatorName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{gmtModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{deleted,jdbcType=BIT}, #{processEnd,jdbcType=BIT}, #{processInstanceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{secret,jdbcType=BIT}, #{reviewType,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
